CustomField.description: Level 1: AOG - Part pricing and availability / General Inquiries (COG responsibility) Level 2: General Technical Questions CMM does not show detail, CMM clarification needed, CMM missing data, Part material inquiry Level 3: Business/Contract Issues Request for warranty or Economic considerations, Pricing reviews, Customer meetings/actions Level 4: Technical/Root Cause Analysis Engineering findings on a specific part, Test procedure on a specific part, Reliability or failure rate of a part, fleet, or Service Bulletin, Evaluation of an inspection interval Level 5: IRB Issues Fleet issues requiring IRB resolution
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Low - Simple issue - One off request Medium - Complex issue - investigation required High - IRB/SRD Program required
CustomField.label: Complexity Level
